item.title: Daniel add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Be like the fountain that overflows, not like the cistern that merely contains." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Alice Sebold
item.description: "You save yourself or you remain unsaved." -- Alice Sebold

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Jorge Luis Borges
item.description: "To fall in love is to create a religion that has a fallible god." -- Jorge Luis Borges

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "And, when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Simone de Beauvoir
item.description: "In itself, homosexuality is as limiting as heterosexuality: the ideal should be to be capable of loving a woman or a man; either, a human being, without feeling fear, restraint, or obligation." -- Simone de Beauvoir

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Sloane Crosley
item.description: "Life starts out with everyone clapping when you take a poo and goes downhill from there. " -- Sloane Crosley

item.title: Daniel add a quote by André Aciman
item.description: "Later that evening in my diary, I wrote: <i>I was exagerrating when I said I thought you hated the piece. What I meant to say was: I thought you hated me. I was hoping you’d persuade me of the opposite—and you did, for a while. Why won’t I believe it tomorrow morning?</i>" -- André Aciman

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Daniel add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "If a thing loves, it is infinite." -- William Blake

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "We are all born mad. Some remain so." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "She would defend herself, saying that love, no matter what else it might be, was a natural talent. She would say: You are either born knowing how, or you never know." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Darlene Craviotto
item.description: "Collaborating on a film script involves two people sitting in a room separated by the silence of two minds working together." -- Darlene Craviotto

item.title: Daniel add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "...I also believe that introversion is my greatest strength. I have such a strong inner life that I’m never bored and only occasionally lonely. No matter what mayhem is happening around me, I know I can always turn inward." -- Susan Cain
